refnamediv.refpurpose: returns minimum x boundaries of a bounding box around a shape.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: returns boundaries of a bounding box around a shape. Bounding boxes around arcs are calculated in assumption that no one arc is longer than a half of full circle.

example.title: Simple Use
example.screen:
